MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: 返回一个可用于循环访问数据读取器中的行的 。

span.span: Returns an that can be used to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

returns.span: 一个 ，可用于循环访问数据读取器中的行。

span.span: An that can be used to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法检索的显式构造函数，但在语言的支持显式**foreach**构造，它会更易于使用循环构造直接以循环访问数据读取器中的行。Although you can use this method to retrieve an explicit constructor, in languages that support an explicit **foreach** construct, it is simpler to use the looping construct directly in order to iterate through the rows in the data reader. 如果你实现此方法，则应返回的新实例或确保你枚举器返回对象。If you implement this method, it should return a new instance of or ensure that your enumerator returns objects.

summary.span: 获取通过执行 SQL 语句更改、插入或删除的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.

value.span: 更改、插入或删除的行数。

span.span: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted.

value.span: 对于 SELECT 语句为 -1；如果没影响任何行或该语句失败，则为 0。

span.span: -1 for SELECT statements; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RecordsAffected`读取了所有行并在关闭之前，未设置属性`DataReader`。The `RecordsAffected` property is not set until all rows are read and you close the `DataReader`.

para.span: 此属性和应为读取器关闭时返回一个值而实现。

span.span: This property and should be implemented to return a value when the reader is closed.

span.span: An instance of to be used when the field points to more remote structured data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int VisibleFieldCount { get; }
.property instance int32 VisibleFieldCount
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property VisibleFieldCount As Integer
public: virtual property int VisibleFieldCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取 中未隐藏的字段的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of fields in the that are not hidden.
The number of fields that are not hidden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值用于确定 中的可见字段的数目。This value is used to determine how many fields in the are visible. 例如，对分部主键执行 SELECT 将以隐藏字段的形式返回该键的其余部分。For example, a SELECT on a partial primary key returns the remaining parts of the key as hidden fields. 隐藏的字段始终追加在可见字段之后。The hidden fields are always appended behind the visible fields.
